prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png
swipes:
Here is some background about Stefan, Suzanne, and Melissa:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman that met Stefan and Suzanne four months ago when she traveled to Munich with her soon-to-be-ex-husband, Edward. Edward is Stefan's cousin. There was strong connection between Melissa and Stefan, although they did not act on it, and maintain respectful boundaries.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: Is Stefan currently involved in an extramarital affair with someone other than me or Suzanne?

Stefan should be represented by the Ascendant's 9th house (foreign connection), Suzanne by the Ascendant's 4th house (Stefan's 7th), and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a compilation of the horary chart data organized by category using horary principles. This list is intended as a foundation for later interpretation of the inquiry (“Is Stefan currently involved in an extramarital affair with someone other than me or Suzanne?”) using the cross‐reference for houses:

──────────────────────────────
1. House Representations and Cross Reference

• Melissa Gale (the querent) is represented by the Ascendant:
 – Ascendant: 14° Taurus

• Suzanne is represented by the Ascendant’s 4th house. In the chart:
 – 4th House starts at 24° Cancer
   (According to the cross reference, this corresponds to Stefan’s 7th house.)

• Stefan is represented by the Ascendant’s 9th house (the “foreign” connection). According to the cross‐reference:
 – Ascendant’s 9th House in Melissa’s chart corresponds to Stefan’s 12th house.
 – In Melissa’s chart, the 9th House begins at 7° Capricorn.
   Note: While no planets are explicitly listed in the 9th house summary, later interpretation will consider any activation (or lack thereof) in that sector.

──────────────────────────────
2. Planetary Positions (as provided)

• Sun: 17° 6′ Aquarius
• Moon: 21° 34′ Taurus
• Mercury: 14° 18′ Aquarius
• Venus: 0° 58′ Aries
• Mars: 19° 12′ Cancer (retrograde indicated)
• Jupiter: 11° 16′ Gemini
• Saturn: 17° 56′ Pisces
• Uranus: 23° 16′ Taurus
• Neptune: 28° 6′ Pisces
• Pluto: 2° 12′ Aquarius
• North Node: 29° 36′ Pisces (retrograde indicated)
• Chiron: 19° 38′ Aries

Additional Points:
 – Ascendant: 14° Taurus
 – Midheaven (MC): 24° Capricorn
 – Imum Coeli (IC): 24° Cancer

──────────────────────────────
3. House Placements (from the provided house system)

• 1st House: Starts at 14° Taurus   [Contains Moon, Jupiter, and Uranus]
• 2nd House: Starts at 17° Gemini
• 3rd House: Starts at 7° Cancer    [Contains Mars]
• 4th House: Starts at 24° Cancer
• 5th House: Starts at 16° Leo
• 6th House: Starts at 24° Virgo
• 7th House: Starts at 14° Scorpio
• 8th House: Starts at 17° Sagittarius
• 9th House: Starts at 7° Capricorn
• 10th House: Starts at 24° Capricorn  [Contains Mercury and Pluto]
• 11th House: Starts at 16° Aquarius  [Contains Sun and Saturn]
• 12th House: Starts at 24° Pisces   [Contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron]

──────────────────────────────
4. Major Aspects (selected with zero‐to–small orb values)

• Mars square Chiron        (orb: 0°)
• Mercury square Ascendant     (orb: 0°)
• MC Opposition IC        (orb: 0°)
• Uranus sextile IC        (orb: 1°)
• Neptune conjunct North Node    (orb: 1°)
• Venus conjunct North Node     (orb: 1°)
• Uranus trine MC         (orb: 1°)
• Venus sextile Pluto       (orb: 2°)
• Moon sextile Mars        (orb: 2°)
• Sun sextile Chiron        (orb: 2°)
• Venus conjunct Neptune      (orb: 2°)
• Moon conjunct Uranus        (orb: 2°)
• Mars trine Saturn        (orb: 2°)
• Pluto sextile North Node     (orb: 3°)
• Saturn sextile Ascendant     (orb: 3°)
• Moon sextile IC         (orb: 3°)
• Sun square Ascendant       (orb: 3°)
• Sun conjunct Mercury        (orb: 3°)
• Mercury trine Jupiter      (orb: 3°)
• Moon trine MC          (orb: 3°)
• Neptune sextile MC        (orb: 4°)
• Mars sextile Uranus        (orb: 4°)
• Moon sextile Saturn        (orb: 4°)
• Sun square Moon          (orb: 4°)
• Neptune trine IC          (orb: 4°)
• Uranus sextile Neptune      (orb: 5°)
• Mars sextile Ascendant      (orb: 5°)
• Mercury sextile Chiron      (orb: 5°)
• Chiron square IC         (orb: 5°)
• Chiron square MC         (orb: 5°)
• Mars opposition MC        (orb: 5°)
• Mars conjunct IC         (orb: 5°)
• Saturn sextile Uranus       (orb: 6°)
• Venus sextile MC         (orb: 6°)
• Jupiter square Saturn       (orb: 6°)
• Sun square Uranus         (orb: 6°)
• Venus trine IC          (orb: 6°)
• Sun trine Jupiter         (orb: 6°)
• Moon square Mercury        (orb: 7°)
• Moon conjunct Ascendant      (orb: 7°)
• Saturn trine IC          (orb: 7°)
• Pluto opposition IC        (orb: 8°)
• Pluto conjunct MC         (orb: 8°)

──────────────────────────────
5. Patterns Noted in the Chart

• T-Square:
 – Involving the MC (24° Capricorn), Chiron (19° Aries), IC (24° Cancer) with Mars (19° Cancer) acting as the focal pivot.

• Multiple Planet Square:
 – Involving Mercury (14° Aquarius), the Ascendant (14° Taurus), Moon (21° Taurus), Sun (17° Aquarius), and Uranus (23° Taurus).

• Cradle Pattern:
 – Involving Mars (19° Cancer), MC (24° Capricorn), Neptune (28° Pisces), Uranus (23° Taurus), and IC (24° Cancer).

──────────────────────────────
6. Special Chart Features

• The Moon was a first quarter moon.
• The overall chart shape is a Bowl.
• The Fixed modality is dominant among the inner planets.
• The bottom right quadrant of the chart is notably empty.
• A preponderance of planets is situated in the top left quadrant.
• Pluto is positioned on the Midheaven.
• Mars and the IC share significant placement.
• The Sextile aspect occurs most frequently (15 instances total).
• The Moon is involved in 11 aspects.
• Neptune in Pisces is placed in its rulership.

──────────────────────────────
This detailed data—including house representations, planetary positions, major aspects, patterns, and special features—is provided to serve as the factual basis for the subsequent horary interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Analyzing the chart for your question – “Is Stefan currently involved in an extramarital affair with someone other than you or Suzanne?” – the following observations arise from the horary details using strict horary principles:

1. House Indicators:
 • You, as querent, are represented by the Ascendant in 14° Taurus.
 • Suzanne occupies the role of the 4th house (starting at 24° Cancer) corresponding to Stefan’s 7th house.
 • Stefan is indicated by the Ascendant’s 9th house (from 7° Capricorn to 24° Capricorn). In this chart no luminary or personal planet is present in this sector, suggesting a lack of active, foreign-oriented or extra-relationship influence.

2. Planetary Activity:
 • The absence of significant planetary activation in the 9th house suggests that circumstances reflective of an extramarital liaison do not show current dynamic motion. Stefan’s extramarital indicator appears dormant.
 • The multiple planet square involving Mercury (14° Aquarius), the Ascendant (14° Taurus), the Moon (21° Taurus), Sun (17° Aquarius), and Uranus (23° Taurus) highlights tensions in matters of communication and personal identity that affect the querent’s present state.
 • The strong Mercury square Ascendant (orb: 0°) may point to difficult or conflicting exchanges in the immediate environment, further underscoring issues within your current relationships rather than an external affair.

3. Aspect Patterns and Tensions:
 • A T-Square formed by the Midheaven, Chiron in 19° Aries, and the IC (24° Cancer) with Mars (19° Cancer) highlights significant friction in matters relating to public versus private life. The acute focus of Mars at 19° Cancer personally stresses domestic or foundational issues rather than external liaisons.
 • The prominence of sextiles (the most frequent aspect) indicates potential opportunities for resolution, yet no sextile or major aspect activates the 9th house’s cusp or its related significator for Stefan. This further diminishes the likelihood of an extramarital situation.

4. Additional Notes:
 • With the Moon (a sensitive indicator of relationship dynamics) well placed in Taurus and involved in favorable aspects (sextiles with Mars and the IC), the focus of emotional energy appears tied to the established, primary connections.
 • The chart’s overall shape—a Bowl, combined with a dominant Fixed quality among inner planets—emphasizes stability and resistance to sudden external changes. An affair in progress would typically be marked by more disruptive, volatile influences, especially in the house representing Stefan’s extramarital affairs.

Based on these specific elements – the lack of activation in the 9th house representing Stefan, the tensions observable primarily within the communication and domestic domains, and the patterns favoring established structures – the indication is that there is no present extramarital affair active for Stefan with anyone beyond the bounds of the current relationships.
